headline: Easy Pancakes
description: This easy pancake recipe is quick to make with simple pantry ingredients. They cook up nice and fluffy for a family-pleasing breakfast or brunch.

video.description: See how to make quick-and-easy pancakes from scratch.
video.name: Easy Pancakes

name: Easy Pancakes

recipeInstructions.text: Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl. Make a well in the center, and pour in milk, oil, and egg. Mix until smooth.

Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat. Pour or scoop batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake; cook until bubbles form and the edges are dry, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip and cook until browned on the other side. Repeat with remaining batter.

review.reviewBody: Does anyone want some pancakes with the salt? Good Lord these were salty! Against my better judgement I put in 1 tsp of salt per instructions and I couldn't even eat the pancakes without having high blood pressure.
They were flat even with 2 tsp baking powder. All ingredients turned out real thin so I don't know if that had anything to do with it.
My family loved it 😊 easy and so tasty
It was absolutely delicious and the whole family loved it, even though they are absolute food critics! 😅
Kids liked this recipe, they are very picky eaters.
I love this recipe it worked out perfectly my kids enjoyed it. With othrt recipes I've tried in the past the pancakes were just not the same
It was simple and easy. They were light and fluffy.
The recipe was great. The pancake batter wasn’t too liquid, and the pancakes were easier to flip, and came out great.

This is my go-to recipe for pancakes. I was out of pancake mix and used this recipe. Definitely better than store bought mix. Threw in a tblsp of cinnamon and a tsp of vanilla extract. Thoroughly impressed my new boyfriend. If I get a ring in 6 months you’ll know why. 😊
Made enough pancakes for two people they were nice and fluffy serve them with apple butter will definitely make them again
No changes to recipes
Amazing! My kids loved it, they liked it sweeter so I added extra sugar.
Love it.
it's so good! the best thing I added chocolate ^^
The pancakes were fluffy and delicious, I didn’t change a thing

They came out so good, fluffy, and sweet! The only things I did differently were adding 1 more tablespoon of sugar, adding 2 tablespoons of vanilla extract, and decreasing the baking soda by 1 and a half teaspoons.
Love this easy recipe! Fluffy and delicious!

Excellent recipe! It's the first time I've been able to make pancakes and though the first two came out a bit wonky, the rest were perfect! I had to up the sugar because they were just too salty and add a bit more flour because they weren't thick enough, but I think next time halfing the salt and adding some vanilla will pay off.
Great recipe and so easy to make! Great tasting. Thank you very much!
It is so easy to make. My kids liked it better then the store bought kind. I will make these again soon. Won't buy store bought again!
Instead of vegetable oil I use melted butter
it was really nice although the pancakes were really soupy. i added some more flour and half of the baking powder. they are really sweet and i recommend it!
It was a great recipe However I did alter it a little bit buy adding cacao to make them mildly choclately then used sliced banana and strawberries and a peanut butter caramel drizzle.
Just made them exactly as shown on the recipe. They came out pretty good. Definitely going to have to make again.
It tasted amazing
good pancakes overall
I tried this recipe it was delicious and SOOO flavorful
It was really easy to make but for some reason it would burn without cooking on the inside. Would not try again sorry
I made this but I decreased the baking powder to 1 tsp. I used butter (1/8 stick of butter) instead of oil and I added 1 tsp vanilla and 2 eggs, not 1. Yummiest pancakes from scratch I've made.

I tried the recipe for breakfast with strawberries and saved the batter for my house mates to try out. I made a batch for myself and other room ate out of the same ingredients I put some organic Plant based pumpkin spice protein powder and it was great.
it was a very good recipe I always love making it!!
This was a good recipe although the baking powder content is too much. I had to add more flower.

Enticin'Tyson your #FirebrandChef here. So, I kind of made it. I replaced the white sugar with raw cane sugar, out of necessity. I don't keep white sugar in te house as I rarely use sugar except as a "seasoning" and even then it is usually an alternative such as natural maple, agave, honey, coconut blossom syrup... but this time raw cane sugar which is usually for guests. Then, I added 3 tablespoons of flour, approxinated the salt because the smallest measuring spoon I have in my set is a 1/2 tbsp (a teaspoon is 1/3 of that 🤦🏾‍♂️I have to do some shopping), and I added some blueberries (without dusting them with cornstarch as some say... that is why I added flour). They turned out quite fluffy!!! And Delicious!
Love it it is my first time making pancake and it is so nice
Really quick and easy to make. Perfect Saturday morning breakfast for me to make for my siblings!
if you use confection sugar or powdered sugar it is sweeter and is fluffier use sifter to get out clumps in flour
It was easy, although it wasn't as great as I expected. The pancake mixture was to soup like,it wouldn't keep its shape,and it's a waste of ingredients! wouldn't recommend.
This recipe was easy to make but way too salty. I recommend cutting the salt by half.
Batter was so thick i got a nice crispy layor on the outside and raw batter on the inside. I made once. Never again

Liked this recipe and gobbled up the warm pancakes as soon as it hit the plate. However, now I have a weird metallic aftertaste from the baking powder. I would cut it down next time to maybe 1 teaspoon or less.
They were delicious 😋 😍 😔
The batter turned out to be a little thick. I added another 1/4 cup of milk and it ended up being just right.
This is an awesome and easy recipe to make! I have tried multiple times now and the pancakes turn out awesome and fluffy!
Thank you for the recipes I am only 11 and I made my first pancake and a giant one too
Perfect first time doing pancakes and the recipe help alot
I loved how easy this was to make, but the problem is it calls for 2-3x more baking powder than necessary. The whole batter just tasted like baking powder 🥹
I loved this recipe, simple and pancakes came out better than store bought.
Its really good and tasty just like Macdonald's
Recipe was fantastic pancakes where Fluffy and yummy......... Just added a pinch of Cinnamon!!
Delicious 😋,but I’ve decreased 1 tablespoon of baking powder.to get the best result use non stick pan
Good and easy
I love how simple this recipe is! The pancakes come out great every time. I add chocolate chips and my family loves it. You can’t go wrong with this recipe.
Perfect and easy added cinnamon and vanilla for my son and I loved it too !
Very easy and I allowed my grandsons to help measure and mix ! They were delicious
i loved it
I love it so much i used it for 1year now
we halved the amount of baking powder,and it was GREAT!!! You can put on syrup and it is just better!!!(not implying that without syrup it is not so great...)
This is my go to formula. Fast and ease, Much better than box mix
I did it exactly as you said. It turned out soft, fluffy and the taste was great! This is the recipe I will follow whenever I make pancakes. Easy and delicious! Thank You!
Love this recipe, I have been using it for years
I doubled the recipe, but add a cup of flour extra. It was real smooth n fluffy.
Awesome
The recipe is super easy! I added chocolate sprinkles to my batch and they came out great

Idk why folks complain about the recipe. My husband & I enjoyed these pancakes & couldn't taste baking powder at all. My only changes were a bit of vanilla and I used buttermilk because I had some to use. The pancakes are light fluffy .
Very simple, very quick to make. My daughter was really craving some pancakes, and we had no quick mixes to use. This really did the trick and she loved them!
This recipe helped a lot. It was really easy and all the things were easy to find. And the result came out perfectly amazing with a delicious taste. Thank You for this recipe.

Good recipe. Didn't have any baking powder and I could take the salt a bit more than I'd like. Maybe because of the missing baking powder. Other than that they tasted pretty good. They were not awful. Will make again when I have all ingredients but will take the suggestion of others and cut back on the baking powder. Looking forward to making this again. Ms. Jen
Good recipe
My First time.

Honestly, this was REALLY good! Made some for my parents and I and we all loved it. However, I suggest get a spoon full of flour put a bit of flower back and put it in your mix. It'll make it thicker and better. Other than that, this is really good! I totally recommend.
it was very delicious
It’s nice, but the salt is too much. I guess 1/4 teaspoon of salt would be great 👌
We loved this recipe! The kids liked helping and it was easy and yummy!

My mom left town for a school week and I realised the night before that we ran out of toast so I decided I can make a simple pancake recipe for waffles since my mom told me once that it works that way but boy let me tell they were delicious
I doubled the recipe for my family, and it wasn't too sweet, but it worked great to make on the griddle and put chocolate chips in.
Great recipe. Super easy and quick.
Easy breezy, made great pancakes
It was an easy to follow recipe. as it was my first time I didn't make any changes I just added some vanilla essence

Thank you! This was just what I was looking for. Quick, easy, and delicious. Ever try make-ahead pancakes? I did a couple extra last time, reheated one in the toaster and one in the microwave (from frozen), both were awesome!
This is my go-to. Really simple, and plenty of room to remix in my own
Really easy. Good results
Sooooo flat and dense..followed recipe exacly. Had better store-bought mixes
I let the batter sit for a few minutes before cooking and they turned out great!

This was an easy and delicious recipe, I 100% recommend if you want to make pancakes that even my 12 year old can make herself :) we also added food colouring to different pancakes as a colourful touch
I HAVEN'T COOKED IT YET, BUT THE BATTER IS SO EASY AND LOOKS GOOD!!!
Delicious my family’s favourite pancake recipe only use this one every single time

This was an awesome recipe. I haved the sugar as I usually do with recipes, I didn’t add as much salt as I usually don’t. All my sons loved these. My son who seldom eats breakfast was grabbing his 2nd to eat while walking out the door to school. Is perfect for a sleepy morning. Will be using this again! To all those who fussed about the baking powder common sense would know that was a typo. It was fixed before I saw it. I would’ve known.
Easy and tasty recipe! I added a tad of vanilla. Next time I’ll add a bit less salt, otherwise light and fluffy and yummy.
Quick, easy and delicious fluffy pancakes. I added vanilla extract to this recipe and it made these pancakes even tastier than they already are! My family loved them.
Maybe make the batter a little thicker, it was very runny and made the pancake bigger and less fluffy
Tasted ok... but they came out flat which is not what I feel a pancake should be. These might be good for something else but not when you're wanting a fluffy pancake.
I added half white and half whole wheat flour and used cashew milk. It was delicious.
The recipe was amazing and way too delicious
Super easy came out really well has become a go to for homemade pancakes and a family favorite.
Very good!
i’m eating them rn, the salt is a bit much for me but i just drenched it in maple syrup.
I followed all the directions, including not overmixing, and they turned out FLAT. I would not use this recipe again.
I made this yesterday according to the recipe. It turn out GREAT! Pancake was perfect.
These are so easy to make and they turn out wonderful every time. Thanks for the recipe.
